Author: GitHixy
Name: LootView
Description: Track all your loot with detailed statistics, duty tracking, history browser, trends analysis, and data export. Features modern UI with customizable styles and transparency. NEW in 1.2.5: Fishing loot tracking with ilms measurement, performance optimizations (fixed FPS drops), GPL-3.0 license, event cleanup fixes, .NET 9 upgrade.
Punchline: Comprehensive loot tracking with statistics and analytics
